Description:
Detects loading of known malicious drivers via the file name of the drivers.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Malicious Driver Load By Name
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (image_loaded="*\\wfshbr64.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\ktmutil7odm.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\ktes.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\a26363e7b02b13f2b8d697abb90cd5c3.sys" OR
